= Religion Chooser =

http://masuland.googlecode.com/files/ReligionChooserPrintScreen.png

The Religion Chooser application aims to be a fun application based on a choice tree structure created by [http://www.holytaco.com/flowchart-determine-what-religion-you-should-follow holytaco.com]. For more information about the application please read the [ReligionChooserFeatureSpec Religion Chooser Feature Specification] document. Implementations with different Flex versions and MVC frameworks are listed below. The code follows additional Flex coding conventions (Flex 4 TODO). 

Flex 4 (Gumbo) with [FlexApplicationArchitectureMVCb "Model - View - Code Behind" (MVCb)] approach:

 * Flex 4 (Gumbo) Religion Chooser with Parsley 2.3.1 (MVCb), ([http://dl.dropbox.com/u/352808/code/ReligionChooserGumboParsleyMVCb/index.html live app]) ([http://dl.dropbox.com/u/352808/code/ReligionChooserGumboParsleyMVCb/srcview/index.html view source]) ([http://masuland.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ReligionChooserGumboParsleyMVCb/trunk/ svn repo])
 * Flex 4 (Gumbo) Religion Chooser with Spring 1.0 (MVCb), ([http://dl.dropbox.com/u/352808/code/ReligionChooserGumboSpringMVCb/index.html live app]) ([http://dl.dropbox.com/u/352808/code/ReligionChooserGumboSpringMVCb/srcview/index.html view source]) ([http://masuland.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ReligionChooserGumboSpringMVCb/trunk/ svn repo])
 * Flex 4 (Gumbo) Religion Chooser with Swiz 1.0 (MVCb), ([http://dl.dropbox.com/u/352808/code/ReligionChooserGumboSwizMVCb/index.html live app]) ([http://dl.dropbox.com/u/352808/code/ReligionChooserGumboSwizMVCb/srcview/index.html view source]) ([http://masuland.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ReligionChooserGumboSwizMVCb/trunk/ svn repo])
